    import { parse } from "url";
                          ~~~~~
!!! error TS2307: Cannot find module 'url' or its corresponding type declarations.
    export const thing = () => parse();
    
==== node_modules/@types/node/index.d.ts (0 errors) ====
    declare module "url" {
        export class Url {}
        export function parse(): Url;
